properties.name: inertia.ssr.enabled
properties.description: Whether server-side rendering is enabled. Defaults to false.

properties.name: inertia.ssr.url
properties.description: The URL of the server-side rendering service. Defaults to 'http://localhost:13714/render'.

properties.name: inertia.ssr.bundle
properties.description: The path to the server-side rendering bundle file.
